item.title: Oracle from Dizwell…
item.description:
Howard has posted a pdf on Oracle Administration on his new website. Do check out. Its awesome.

Update: Howard has shutdown his website, so unfortunately this pdf is not available.

Sidhu

item.title: Howard’s decision…
item.description:
Howard Rogers has done a post on his blog that is the site Dizwell worth it ? Do post your opinion. If he plans to close it down, we will miss a great resource for Oracle.

Sidhu

Comments

Comment by Aman Sharma on 2007-10-23 09:20:00 +0530

Fingers crossed that he wont do that and thats the voice of all(almost) too!Hope he takes the right decision.
Cheers,
Aman….
